title: Allah Warns those who do not carry out his Orders to Dispense with Their Service - Dr Zakir Naik
transcript: and today one of the best form of jihad is dawa conveying The Message of Islam to those who are unaware of it today is the F of every Muslim that he should convey The Message of Islam to those who are not aware of it to those non-muslims who are today yet More than 70% of the world population they non-muslims it's duty to convey The Message of Islam to them Allah says in the Quran in Surah Muhammad chapter number 47 verse number 38 if you turn away from your path if you turn away from your duty Allah will substitute in your place and other people and they will not be like you
